$interpreted: Sophie: That's strange. We've been asking all day and not a single sailor has seen a Rune Master. Did the audience member make a mistake?
Jia-Shen: All you townies step right up! Don't ya'll miss this chance to dance with chance! It's me, Jia-Shen, master of singing, dancing, ahootin' and ahollerin'!
Rune: Is that...a circus?
Sophie: Another hack carny...
Sophie: No...uh...I...don't get the wrong impression! Maybe there's some hidden talent. Let's take a look! Know your enemy, that's what they say!
Sophie: Perhaps he didn't see Elio at this specific stall.
Jia-Shen: Listen closely. Long, long ago, there was a nation blessed by the God of Water. His ribs became the oasis of the desert, protecting the people.
Jia-Shen: ...However, after an unfavored Queen took the throne, the Desert became a sandstorm, suffocating the folks therein!
Jia-Shen: A bunch of mysterious pirates arrived, guns a blazin'...killing folks in the blink of an eye!
Jia-Shen: But then! A savior came to save us of our sins! A young maiden, chosen by the God of Water!
Jia-Shen: Limitless power! She can bring life to a withered tree, heal a whole bucket o' sicknesses, and perform all sorts of miracles.
Jia-Shen: In the mind of simple folks, it's 'bout time the Queen stepped down~
Young Person: You can say that again! The Holy Maiden saved my younger sister's life!
Jia-Shen: But miracles, are they really what they appear to be?
Jia-Shen: Now, I ain't no genius, just a simpleton carny whose seen a thing or two.
Jia-Shen: But you townies might not know that performances don't only happen on a stage~
Misa: What did you say!?
Misa: How dare you blaspheme against the Snake God! Speak those words again!
Young Person: The Holy Maiden! It's the Holy Maiden, Misa!
Sophie: So that's the Holy Maiden Misa...she's just a child...
Misa: Are you accusing me of putting on a show? Do you dare doubt me!?
Jia-Shen: (You have got to be kiddin' me...perfect timing...)
Jia-Shen: Now, now, now. Don't get a wild hare up your ass. I was just telling a tale, that's all!
Misa: Don't you speak lies! Your props were quite obviously mimicking the Queen and I!
Jia-Shen: Hey there now! I was just drummin' up some business...
Jia-Shen: ——Please, Holy Maiden, forgive little ol' me!
Religious Cleric: Holy Maiden! So, here you are!
Religious Cleric: How many times have I told you? You are too valuable to be leaving the Holy Shrine whenever you like...what have you done to the Holy Maiden?
Misa: This wicked turtle blasphemed against the Snake Gods! Humiliate me and you will be forgiven. But disrespect the Snake Gods and pay the price!
Jia-Shen: Well, technically I'm a tortoise...I mean, I know I look like a turtle, but...
Religious Cleric: Turtle or not, it's still a grave sin! Heretic! You dare go against the great and powerful Misa!
Sophie: Blessed Holy Maiden, this turtle...tortoise has already admitted his fault. You are of limitless power, forgive him, won't you?
Sophie: (...just pretend like I'm working here...definitely not tryin' to help this guy...)
Misa: Heretic, the mercy of the Snake God must not be taken lightly! Forgiveness does not come at a low price!
Misa: Remove his shell! Throw him in the ocean!
Religious Cleric: Yes, Ma'am!
Sophie: Stop! Do you want him to die?
Misa: If this is what the Snake God wants, so it must be.
Sophie: You just can't be reasoned with, can you!?
Religious Cleric: The criminal is resisting! Report it to the Holy Shrine!
Sophie: Oh, no! Tortoise fellow, you'd best get out of here...
Sophie: Where'd he go!?
Misa: Do you dare...
Misa: Dare...*cough*...*cough* *cough*...
Religious Cleric: Blessed Holy Maiden!
Misa: *cough*...*cough* *cough*...I...
Religious Cleric: Holy Maiden, you must drink this medicine...
Misa: I'm...fine...they...
Religious Cleric: Holy Maiden, there's too much bickering here. Let us return to the Holy Shrine.
Sophie: What kind of sickness does she have?
Lizard Grandma: Terrible tortoise! You're always talking a storm o' lies!
Lizard Grandpa: I told you if you ain't shut that yapper something awful a fixin' to happen. Is the Holy Maiden Misa really who you want to mess with?
Jia-Shen: A story has got to be weaved all sorts of crazy. Otherwise, ain't no one want to listen. I can't keep borrowing your money.
Jia-Shen: ...Ouch!
Lizard Grandma: Still talking back!
Lizard Grandpa: You damn right you been borrowing too much!
Jia-Shen: Ow! ow! ow! Please, no more. My soft skin!
Sophie: Hey, Tortoise! Don't you have any sense of loyalty? We save you and you just run away?
Jia-Shen: Here come some real saviors.
Sophie: ...Huh? I thought you wouldn't admit it.
Jia-Shen: I most sincerely, most humbly thank you for saving me when it got rough. It's just that when I see danger, it's instinct for an animal to escape.
Rune: Instinct to escape?
Jia-Shen: In the Desert, if a young Blazetail Lizard encounters a fully grown Brown Wolf, all they can do is flee.
Jia-Shen: I'm just a poor animal, I've got to follow my instincts.
Rune: Is that so...?
Sophie: Rune, don't you listen to his blabbering!
Jia-Shen: This is just my philosophy for conducting myself in society~
Sophie: ...what kind of game are you playing now?
Jia-Shen: Now, have my gracious benefactors been injured?
Jia-Shen: All I've got is some simpleton knowledge of countryside healing, but I should be able to heal y'all up nice and good.
Rune: We're not...injured.
Jia-Shen: *sigh*...how unfortunate...
Sophie: We're not injured and you're disappointed!
Jia-Shen: Please, Miss, don't be upset! Please! I just need some way to repay you...
Jia-Shen: Ah, yes. This young circus lady is looking for someone, isn't she?
Sophie: How'd you know?
Jia-Shen: I heard you talking to them sailor boys. Now that I think of it, I saw that fellow you're looking for yesterday!
Jia-Shen: This little bit of intel is something to show my thanks~
Jia-Shen: Uhh, he was over by that wharf. There was a cute little girl following him.
Sophie: (Girl? Could it be his girlfriend?)
Rune: Sophie, aren't we going?
Sophie: (If Elio already has a girlfriend, then I...I really want to see him, but I just don't have it in me...)
Sophie: (What if Elio looks down on me?)
Rune: Sophie?
Sophie: (...maybe it's his sister...don't be silly, Sophie...If he had a girlfriend, he would have told me...)
Rune: Sophie will wait here...I'll help Sophie...find Elio.
Sophie: Huh? Rune! Wait...!

Tortoise fellow, you'd best get out of here...","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_027","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Where'd he go!?","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_020","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Do you dare...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Dare...*cough*...*cough* *cough*...","sfxName":"h0154sx_story_008","sfxVolume":0.7},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Religious Cleric","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3158c2","IconName":"t3158c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Blessed Holy Maiden!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"*cough*...*cough* *cough*...I...","sfxName":"h0154sx_story_008","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Religious Cleric","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3158c2","IconName":"t3158c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Holy Maiden, you must drink this medicine...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_19_002","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm...fine...they...","sfxName":"h0154sx_story_012","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Religious Cleric","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3158c2","IconName":"t3158c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Holy Maiden, there's too much bickering here. Let us return to the Holy Shrine.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What kind of sickness does she have?","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_017","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Lizard Grandma","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3159c1","IconName":"t3159c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Terrible tortoise! You're always talking a storm o' lies!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Lizard Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3178c1","IconName":"t3178c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I told you if you ain't shut that yapper something awful a fixin' to happen. Is the Holy Maiden Misa really who you want to mess with?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"A story has got to be weaved all sorts of crazy. Otherwise, ain't no one want to listen. I can't keep borrowing your money.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_22_003","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Ouch!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_22_004","SpeakerName":"Lizard Grandma","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3159c1","IconName":"t3159c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Still talking back!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_22_005","SpeakerName":"Lizard Grandpa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3178c1","IconName":"t3178c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You damn right you been borrowing too much!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_22_006","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ow! ow! ow! Please, no more. My soft skin!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hey, Tortoise! Don't you have any sense of loyalty? We save you and you just run away?","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_027","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Here come some real saviors.","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_002","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Huh? I thought you wouldn't admit it.","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_020","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_24_002","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I most sincerely, most humbly thank you for saving me when it got rough. It's just that when I see danger, it's instinct for an animal to escape.","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_011","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_24_003","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Instinct to escape?","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_001","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_24_004","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"In the Desert, if a young Blazetail Lizard encounters a fully grown Brown Wolf, all they can do is flee.","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_009","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_24_005","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm just a poor animal, I've got to follow my instincts.","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_002","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_24_006","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Is that so...?","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_028","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_24_007","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Rune, don't you listen to his blabbering!","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_027","sfxVolume":0.6},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_24_008","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This is just my philosophy for conducting myself in society~","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_017","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_24_009","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...what kind of game are you playing now?","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_026_ver1","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now, have my gracious benefactors been injured?","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_023","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"All good.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We're not...injured.","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_014","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"*sigh*...how unfortunate...","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_018","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_26_002","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We're not injured and you're disappointed!","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_016","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_26_003","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Please, Miss, don't be upset! Please! I just need some way to repay you...","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_006","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah, yes. This young circus lady is looking for someone, isn't she?","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_012","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How'd you know?","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_017","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_27_002","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I heard you talking to them sailor boys. Now that I think of it, I saw that fellow you're looking for yesterday!","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_013","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This little bit of intel is something to show my thanks~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Uhh, he was over by that wharf. There was a cute little girl following him.","sfxName":"t0156sx_story_029","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Girl? Could it be his girlfriend?)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sophie, aren't we going?","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_019","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_29_002","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(If Elio already has a girlfriend, then I...I really want to see him, but I just don't have it in me...)","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_024","sfxVolume":0.3},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_29_003","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(What if Elio looks down on me?)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_29_004","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sophie?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_29_005","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...maybe it's his sister...don't be silly, Sophie...If he had a girlfriend, he would have told me...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sophie will wait here...I'll help Sophie...find Elio.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_204_002_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Huh? Rune! Wait...!","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_020","sfxVolume":0.5}]}
